revised_title: Newton's Aether Theory and Hauksbee's Experiments
tldr: The author examines Newton's unpublished optical manuscript, which reveals his draft of a proposed addition to his 'Opticks.' The manuscript demonstrates how Newton's belief in an ethereal medium, or aether, was influenced by Francis Hauksbee's experiments on electro-luminescence and electrical attraction. Newton considered incorporating this experimental evidence into his work, but ultimately decided to present it in the form of new observations rather than as part of his 'Opticks' theory.
